# Project Overview
This project explores the temporal and spatial distribution of pigmentation-related SNPs in the hominin lineage. 

# Key Results
Background on the samples analyzed is available on the **Introduction** analysis page:
- [View UV map and aDNA sites](introduction.html)

Population genetics analyses are available on the **Analysis** page:
- [View genetic PCAs](analysis.html)

# Data Sources
- NASA Earth Observations: [AURA_UVI_CLIM_M](https://neo.gsfc.nasa.gov/view.php?datasetId=AURA_UVI_CLIM_M)
- NHGRI-EBI Catalog of GWAS associated pigmentation variants: [NHGRI-EBI](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/gwas/efotraits/OBA_VT0002095)
- Simons Genome Diversity Project: [SGDP](https://www.simonsfoundation.org/simons-genome-diversity-project/)
- Max-Plank Institute neanderthal genomes: [MPI-EVA](http://ftp.eva.mpg.de/neandertal/)
